body.name: KOHLER K-3940-0 Kathryn Comfort Height Elongated One-Piece 1.28 GPF Toilet with Aqua Piston Flush Technology, Concealed Trapway and Left-Hand Trip Lever, White
body.stockDetail: Only 3 left in stock - order soon.

climatePledgeFriendly.details: WaterSense is a voluntary label from the US Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), which identifies products that meet criteria from the EPA for water-efficiency and performance.

features: One-piece toilets integrate the tank and bowl into a seamless, easy-to-clean design
Comfort Height feature offers chair-height seating that makes sitting down and standing up easier for most adults
Coordinates with other products in the Kathryn collection
Aqua Piston canister allows water to flow into the bowl from all sides (360 degrees), increasing the power and effectiveness of the flush
Durable canister design has 90% less exposed seal material than a 3-inch flapper, for leak-free performance
body.description: Product Description Capture the classic look of the 1930s with the Kathryn collection's angular lines and molded edges. This one-piece toilet features a convenient chair-like height and compact elongated bowl for comfortable use, as well as a concealed tramway for sleek looks and simple cleaning. A 1.28-gallon flush provides significant water savings of up to 16,500 gallons per year, compared to a 3.5-gallon toilet, without sacrificing performance. This tank features innovative Aqua Piston technology, a patented flush engine that delivers a fast, powerful and plug-free flush. From the Manufacturer Capture the classic look of the 1930s with the Kathryn collection's angular lines and molded edges. This one-piece toilet features a convenient chair-like height and compact elongated bowl for comfortable use, as well as a concealed trapway for sleek looks and simple cleaning. A 1.28-gallon flush provides significant water savings of up to 16,500 gallons per year, compared to a 3.5-gallon toilet, without sacrificing performance. This tank features innovative AquaPiston technology, a patented flush engine that delivers a fast, powerful, and plug-free flush.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Never Compromise We push flushing power, bowl cleanliness and toilet design to the leading edge. We never compromise. Why should you?

Saving Water Is For The Birds. And fish. And animals. And the future with Kohler water-efficient toilets. Wipe Out Dirt. A clever design reduces the nooks and crannies on the toilet base to make it easy to clean. Kick Your Plunger To The Curb. Kohler’s canister flush valve packs a powerful punch to eliminate clogs without wasting water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Got two of these for our apartment. Very easy to install. Look great with clean lines and classic design. Flushing performance is awesome ( was initially apprehensive about 1.28 capacity but aquaspiston tech is amazing)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars replacement valve gasket not available
reviews.reviewText: The toilet was fine until the valve gasket began leaking. The tank runs continuously. The original replacement valve gasket has been replaced by Kohler with one that does not fit this toilet, making it impossible to repair. So we have a toilet that cost almost $900 that we will likely have to replace. Kohler has not been helpful. They gave me an incorrect replacement part # that does not work with this toilet. I do not recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Crooked tank! See pics! Disappointed!
reviews.reviewText: After paying almost $1000 for this toilet and waiting weeks for it to arrive, our plumber finally installed it yesterday. We thought it was installed crooked so we had them come and redo it. Unfortunately, the actual toilet itself is crooked. The tank, which is one piece with the toilet, was attached improperly and is almost 1 quarter inch off. We are so disappointed! What a lack of craftsmanship. I very much regret spending so much on a toilet, and getting so excited for its arrival. Please avoid!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The base and the cover are not compatible. The ...
reviews.reviewText: The base and the cover are not compatible. The cover provided does not fit onto the tank of the base. Amazon has been working past month to correct problem. Had to send pictures to Kohler as they did not believe when detail part numbers were sent for each component. Having to be patient. Do hope and expect Amazon to take both components back at no cost if Kohler cannot provide a cover that fits. Person of Amazon handling matter has been gracious and thoughtful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2020
